coded_answer.p: I have received your letter, which is makemakes me happy. TheFor the first time in my life I have won a competition. I would like to attempttake you up on your inviteinvitation in July. I am only able to take my holidyholiday in July, the. The rest of the year I work.

I would prefer to stay in a tent. I think it is more enjoyable. I don't know why but I have feel toward to tent from my childhood. When I was a kid I used to ask my mum to buy me a tent for my bedroom so I would be able to sleep in there instead of my bed.

I'm crayzcrazy about tennis and swimming. I used to take tennis and swimming lessonlessons when I was in high school. I have good talent and skill about them. Most of the weekend I go for swimingswimming and play tennis. That is the fun for me to doing it.

Do I have to bring some cash onwith me? Do you think travel chaquechequechequestraveller's cheques would be more securesafe? I also wouldwould also like to get some information about the weather. What doesis it like in July over there?

Shopping is part of our life. I don't like shopping. Can you imageneimagine fridayFriday night.? Most of the people get paypaid on fridayFriday night then they go to shopping. I can't stand onin the long queuequeues. All day you had worked hardYou have worked hard all day, on. On the way home you want to pick up some milk from the shop and you have to waitewait on avarageaverage ten minuteten minutes on average. It is not good. Your time havehas been stolen. I can't cope with that. I prefer goto go home without any milk. There are a lot of tiletilltills in the shop but most of them are closeclosed. It is annoyedannoying.

There are a lot of optionoptions and itemitems maketo make our chosechoice difficutdifficult. itIt is hard to make decideto decide which is suitablebest for you. After shopping you have to carry a havyheavy bag a long way to home
